title: Bold grotesque / Chelsea Peretti: One of the Greats
content:
Can anyone ID this sans? Slightly squared 'O', 'C' remind me of Aurora Grotesk. The 'G' and 'R' are quite stylised. Thanks.

Font: 

 Knockout 

Solved By: 

 [Les ONeill](http://web.archive.org/web/20150416024555/http:/typophile.com/user/216897 "View user profile.")

author: hblackett

comments.content:
Hoefler Type's 'Knockout', Full Cruiserweight would be my guess:
